alert.note: Alert for Mountains Of San Benito County And Interior Monterey County Including Pinnacles National Monument (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 2:22PM PDT by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern San Benito County through 245 PM PDT... At 221 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 17 miles northeast of King City, or 29 miles east of Arroyo Seco, moving northwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern San Benito County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Mountains Of San Benito County And Interior Monterey County Including Pinnacles National Monument
